Publisher's blurb:

"DAY OF INFAMY is the second game of The Second World War Series (TSWW) from Diffraction Entertainment for the Pacific Theater of War.

"Day of Infamy (DOI) is the TSWW-series game covering the day that lived in infamy forever; Pearl Harbour and the first 3 years of the North Pacific and Central Pacific war. With over 2,200 counters, 11 maps (several at 75 mile SSZ scale) and the usual TSWW horde of At Starts (Pearl Harbour, Midway, Operation M (north), the Allied counter offensive in the North Pacific, Guam, etc., this is the ideal introduction to the Blue Water Naval System that is a core component to the TSWW game system.
Featuring the usual TSWW refinements including multiple modules and scenarios, DOI is the next release in the TSWW Game series, with massive fleet actions and a very special raid from Shangri-La.

"The awesome all-new release includes the following:

"- 2,280 high-quality counters on 8 sheets.
- 11 map segments – 7 at 15 miles to the hex, 4 at 75 miles to the hex
- Fully bound rules (expanded to handle the 75 mile hexes on the strategic displays)
- OBs (Axis, Allied, At Start, Production)
- Charts (also expanded to handle the 75 mile hexes on the strategic displays)
- North and Central Pacific theatres from Dec I 1941 turn through Oct II 1943
- Numerous scenarios from Pearl Harbor, Guam and the full Campaign Game"
